scripts.build:docs: pnpm --filter=esm run docs:build && mv packages/esm/docs/.vitepress/dist docs
scripts.flatpak:bundle: mkdir -p dist/target && flatpak build-bundle repo dist/target/dev.sallon.lenz.flatpak dev.sallon.lenz
scripts.version:major: pnpm version major --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:minor: pnpm version minor --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:patch: pnpm version patch --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:premajor: pnpm version premajor --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:preminor: pnpm version preminor --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:prepatch: pnpm version prepatch --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
scripts.version:prerelease: pnpm version prerelease --message 'chore(release): Bump version to v%s'
